website_summaries.verdict: Whether traveling the world or learning about it, this is a unique and educational way to explore with a brightly-colored, detailed map – scratch by scratch.
pros: Offers a modern twist on a world map with a fun concept that allows owners to scratch off countries to customize it to their needs – ideal for students and travelers
cons: Not very big compared to others on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone who loves to travel!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: *Big enough to see smaller countries/states *Includes country flags you can scratch off *Shows latitude/longitude CONS: (see pic) *Some states that are together are all the same color and can blend together *If you scratch too hard, it can actually take off the color I found that using a coin was usually too big for smaller areas. Use the end of a paper clip! Works great, just don't press down too hard!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MAP !!! Perfect Gift !!
customer_reviews.text: This is better in person than on screen. It's a quality piece and my son and daughter-in-law LOVE it!!!! It's a great gift for world travelers!!!!!! Great price. I highly recommend this! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sheri J.

customer_reviews.title: Traveler's friend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product... planning on buying more to give as gifts to traveler friends. This is fun and creative way to document your travel.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa -.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad. He is quite a traveler. He was really excited about it and inpressed by the uniqueness of the gift. He had no idea the product existed prior to receiving it. If you want to dress it up a bit you could frame it if you’re giving it as a gift. I chose this one over the others because you could also scratch off individual states.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a Traveler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave me this map because I enjoy traveling so much. It was fun reliving the memories of my trips and picking new places to go. I have given it as a gift several times to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map for my mom as a valentines day present. It is such a great idea and it is an awesome way of recording of where you've been in the world. I would strongly recommend this product to anyone who loves traveling around the world or even just in america. Thank you Landmass.
customer_reviews.author: leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Meet the expectation
customer_reviews.text: Love it... The size is perfect for my living room, easy to use and very cute. It arrive sooner than expected
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the traveler in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiancé for Christmas and he loved it. I got an inexpensive poster frame as well to hang it on the wall. The quality was good for the price you're paying for it. We had no issues with scratching off some of the places we have been thus far!! My advice would just be to scratch gently to prevent any unintentional damage. This is a perfect way to document your travels, my fiancé loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Pati

customer_reviews.title: Love it, perfect wall decoration and great gift
customer_reviews.text: I adore this map! I love the individual states and provinces and flags to scratch off too. Looks amazing on my wall as both a decorative piece and accomplishment! Every traveler should have something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for others and for oneself....
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought five of these maps as gifts. They are giving so much joy to the recipients, I decided it was time I had one for myself! It just arrived, beautifully packaged in a rectangular box, with a sturdy tube inside containing a perfect size map. I carefully unrolled it, and it is currently on a table weighted down with heavy books. It's great fun scratching off the Countries and flags with a coin, and seeing the vibrant colors pop out. Although I'm very well traveled, I still need to get one foot into Russia to fully appreciate this map in all it's splendor.
customer_reviews.author: purpleD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have this hanging on my wall. Loved it, easy to scratch, and the box looks cool too
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Midori

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small issue with the first map I received. It had a few small scratched areas. I took pictures and then e-mailed them to Landmass Goods. Right away they e-mailed me back to apologize and had already gotten a new map to sent out to me. Seriously, best customer service expierence I've had. Oh, and the map is beautiful! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Quality not great after sometime
customer_reviews.text: We started to scratch off on the map and we noticed after a few weeks, the map just becomes "stale". As we scratch off, the covering barely comes off and if you apply any little pressure, it just rips through the map after sometime. Not great quality at all of the map and has not been as good as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a map for Fathers Day. The map came packaged very nicely and secure, but was damaged... Wrinkled and torn up a bit, not ok for displaying! I contacted Landmass customer service though right away, and they took care of me! They sent me a brand new one with speedy shipping. This one looks great! My hubby has done a lot of traveling, so it will be fun to scratch away. Fun item, definitely recommended! I love companies with good service. Problems can occur with even the best items; it's all about how you handle things... THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: K. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great look and Design!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my girlfriend, and she loved it!! I am pretty sure she is now planning a trip to Antarctica just to see what color is underneath the surface. This product will awake the travel bug in anyone. The gold and black background make the colors pop and it looks fantastic in a wooden frame with the glass removed.
customer_reviews.author: Blake H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for the traveler in your life
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bf's 13 year old daughter as a Christmas present and she loved it! She opened it immediately and started scathing away. The map is great quality and the colors of the countries you scratch off are bright. My only complaint is that some of the smaller countries/states are hard to read, but they were easy to scratch off with a toothpick. All in all I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LA Egan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, no regional or state borders for China & Russia
customer_reviews.text: This map is a great concept for the frequent traveler. The map arrived in perfect condition and the underlying colors are beautiful. However, it is not easy to reveal only the select counties neatly (i.e. without uncovering the borders of the neighboring countries as well). Also, larger countries like China & Russia are not broken into their various States. Some may appreciate that 2 trips will uncover 25% of the entire map. Others may find the inability to specify just the states or regions visited in these two major countries a drawback... Otherwise the high quality material, fonts and overall design make this worth framing & hanging even for those who are detail oriented.
customer_reviews.author: Sharifa A. Salim

customer_reviews.title: Countries not properly mapped
customer_reviews.text: The map is ok but if you’re looking to see exactly where countries are, the map does a very poor job at that especially for Asian countries. Not sure who created this map but it’s definitely not aligned with how the countries are mapped on google maps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - going in the trash
customer_reviews.text: The scratch off idea is cute but does not work well at all. It honestly looks terrible. The scratcher they give you is impossible to use and either takes off too much color or does not take the top layer off. It is difficult to use and ineffective. When trying to use coins it is even worse. Honestly, it looks so bad that I don't want to put it on my wall and am probably going to throw it away. Other people seem to have the same problem. While there are pictures posted where it looks ok, so maybe there are some that are better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Missing countries and flags
customer_reviews.text: The map does not have every country and flag listed. If this is suppose to be a world map I expect all the countries in the world to be listed. There are flags of countries missing that I have visited and couldn't scratch off.
customer_reviews.author: BeBe BaB

customer_reviews.title: Like the idea but horrible scratch
customer_reviews.text: The scratch doesn't come out too cleanly. Removes a messy mark.
customer_reviews.author: Seo Young Myaeng

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size....
customer_reviews.text: The map that I received is not as described. Received it as a gift, and did not attempt to frame until today. First time unveiling it and it arrived with a bent corner, However, the worst part is that it states that it is 17" by 24" and it is most definitely is not. I purchased a frame and a matte based on this information and it does not fit the matte. Costing more money than the map itself, and it is past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler reddington

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great gift. The scratch off parts are difficult and made the paper crinkle after putting lots of pressure to scratch. Otherwise it’s just a fun gift
customer_reviews.author: Alison Russell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am a happy human being with the product. It came in a triangular prism type of outer box with a cylindrical container inside containing the map. The map is in good condition and it even comes with a protective foam layer when rolled so it doesn't scratch during shipping. The person I gave this to loved it and is ready to start scratching away as she walks around this majestic ball of dirt we call Earth (ball of dirt... let that sink in flat-earthers). I would recommend and props to you individuals for making this. Thanks for the amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Too small, non visible islands and small countries
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked this if it was bigger. I like the colors of the map and that the background is white. Most of the ones i see here on amazon have a black background. But I returned it because it was too small. A lot of countries are not even visible on it, specially the islands
customer_reviews.author: sach509

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but might be for you
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for something framed that would take pushpins with different colors for each family members. it wasn't framed, and the markers are stick on flags. Not the look I was going for! it is an attractive map. if you are looking for a scratch off map with tags and flags, this would definitely be for you.
customer_reviews.author: kwh

customer_reviews.title: not 193 nation states
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the recognised 193 nation states but 210 mixed nation states and autonomous countries and the Antilles. Ironically, where we live, Sint Maarten is not on there but falls under the Antilles. That said, lots of fun scratching off the countries you've been Nice that Canada, America and Australia have the states on them to scratch off. Would have been nice to see the same for Russia, China, Brazil etc as other large countries that perhaps one only visited the capital or one major city?
customer_reviews.author: Mae Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Not as the picture suggests
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hang flat against the wall. Also when revealing the counties under the scratch surface, they don't appear as clear as they do on the picture, it's full of dark markings. Disappointed especially considering the price of this.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love the map
customer_reviews.text: Love the map! I got it as a gift for my husband. The only reason I didn’t give a 5 star review is because I thought there would be a way to hang it on the wall. We will go buy a frame but it’s so cool to see where he’s been and where he wants to go!
customer_reviews.author: Bev Biehl

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute and all but :(
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me a year ago and i loved the colors of it- today we tried to put more countries we’ve been to on it and it completely destroyed it! I think if we ever ordered one again we wouldn’t even try attempt scratching them off! I’m not sure if the time we had it made it more difficult to scratch off or what but either way :(
customer_reviews.author: joy amos

customer_reviews.title: Love the map!
customer_reviews.text: It was fun scratching off all the places my husband and I have visited. It's such a great way to visualize our next trip! Obviously, not anytime soon, but exciting to see where we've been. This is definitely a great gift to give to friends and family who love to travel.
customer_reviews.author: MaRy

customer_reviews.title: World map
customer_reviews.text: The poster was not as big as I’d hoped it was. Too small to really see the locations. If placing in your child’s room look at getting a large world map that is more detailed. Wish it had different color pins to showcase where hes been and where he wants to go.
customer_reviews.author: LEF

customer_reviews.title: Scratching takes practice
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of traveling and have made my own map of the US (5' x 4') that hangs in my office to put pins in where we have ventured to. This is a great size to keep track of our world travels now. Scratching off the top layer takes a little practice so you don't go to deep into the all white paper underneath. A great conversation piece. And to make it more colorful, all the nations' flags below. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nicolich

customer_reviews.title: I’d order again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my stepmom for her birthday. It was the perfect gift for that person who has “everything.” My parents have transitioned from cruises to a camper as their vacation preference and this was this was a great way to see where they’ve been. I am going to look into a US version of this; not sure if this particular company offers that, but if they do I will not hesitate to order it through them. It came in a cool box without any issues. It’s the perfect size (not small and not obnoxiously big) and the quality is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Black

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this map! I love traveling and my parents gifted me a Landmass scratch off map a few years ago to keep track of where I've been. Scratching off a new country/state has become one of the coolest parts of my travel experiences. My boyfriend enjoys geography and hopes to travel more, so I got him this map for Christmas and am very excited for him to open it! It's a quality product that scratches off well... Just don't scratch too hard 🙂 a helpful tip: a chopstick at an angle is a great scratching tool. Thanks for a great and meaningful addition to my wall! I can't wait to add my boyfriend's as well!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible. The pick doesn’t scratch at all and using ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. The pick doesn’t scratch at all and using a coin completely removes everything down to the backing. It looks awful and unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Jopwarmy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. We bought a frame and hung it on our travel wall. We only scratch off states and places that we've been together! It is a really cool talking point when people come over. The quality of the print is really good, and the colors are very vibrant once scratched off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky G

customer_reviews.title: Hard to flatten
customer_reviews.text: It has been very difficult to get this map strait since it's been curled up in a tube. When we try to flatten it it is very easy to accidentally scrape off some of the covering. Otherwise very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Switzer Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter and the scratch off material won't scratch off! When it does scratch off, it takes the paper underneath with it leaving holes in the map. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Bucket List Map
customer_reviews.text: Awesome map. I really enjoyed this map, and it inspires me to travel more. This is the ultimate Bucket List for travel, it allows you to keep track of all the countries you have visited as well as the countries that you want to visit. I would highly recommend this map.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult To Work With
customer_reviews.text: Using the enclosed "pick", I found it almost impossible to remove the overlay covering selected countries. This was very frustrating. I finally found that a dime coin worked better than any other instrument.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Given that i still give 4 stars as I do love this map
customer_reviews.text: The europe area and the carribean could've been bigger as they are just hard to see the area where to scratch. The China and Russia are too generic. I was kind of expecting Hong Kong will have its own little area to scratch but it was just bundled in China. Unlike Canada or United states where it is divided based on states. Given that i still give 4 stars as I do love this map. In fact I even order my friends the same for Christmas present. Hopefully they will like or love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel light
customer_reviews.text: This map is perfect for frequent or infrequent travelers. Everyone loves a good scratch off and this doesn't disappoint. I got this for a friend and she loved it - I got it knowing that she'll be traveling this next summer so she'll be able to scratch off England pretty soon!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Barbeau

customer_reviews.title: Great Map
customer_reviews.text: I looked online for a gift for my sister in law. So I thought of a map to keep a record of all of her traveling. I didn't want it to be too cumbersome. This one caught my eye because it was white and gold not a dark color like many others. I cant wait to give it to her, I think she will love it!
customer_reviews.author: pak

customer_reviews.title: Great Map!
customer_reviews.text: Love this map! I really love that it has the lines for each individual state in the US as well as having all of the countries of the world! Map is a bit smaller than what I expected, but I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: rec2797

customer_reviews.title: Love the size...but...missing flags of some countries
customer_reviews.text: The map was the perfect size that I was looking for, it is not to big or too small. However, I was disappointed that some countries were shown on the map but there was no flag for them. E.g. Cayman Islands or Taiwan. However a part from that, I am enjoying the scratch off map it is encouraging me to continue traveling and experiencing different places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice. Well packaged, no wrinkles. Recipients couldn't wait to begin scratching off places they'd been. Will look very nice framed. Looks good with only a few or a lot of places scratched off. Very good gift. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: m3gh@z

customer_reviews.title: Awesome map!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my brother and he loves it! Comes with some stickers and a scratch-off tool that works just fine (or you could always use a quarter). Stuff scratches off without issue. My brother has it hanging in his study room and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ronit Majumdar

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: I debated on buying this for my adult children who travel quite a lot. Based on some of the reviews I decided to buy it and it was a big hit. Definetly good for kids or adults
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Chicken

customer_reviews.title: An Instant Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine map, my wife liked it a lot; got to work on it as soon as she opened it! The flags are a really cool feature and the colors give it a nice pop when scratched. My next move is to get it framed without any glass so we can have it hung and still scratch off as we continue to travel. Overall this is a great item and value.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for travelers
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this map as a gift from my mom about a year ago and she loved it so much and everyone that came into our home was also amazed by it. I decided to get one for myself now because i kinda got jealous plus i wanted to replace they one i have that doesn’t look nearly as cool as this one. If you love to travel or have a friend how love to travel, this is the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Perla Medina

customer_reviews.title: Travel mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom goes in at least one cruise a year and has been for over 10 years so I thought this would be a cool gift for her to get and visualize every where she’s been. Sometimes she goes on cruises tinplaces she’s been already and I think this will be a good way for her to see where she HASNT been yet
customer_reviews.author: Cheria

customer_reviews.title: Landmass travel record map, a true work of art!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen a few Landmass products over the past couple of years, friends had them framed with no glass so they may update their map after every trip. I have selected the dark glossy map as a gift for a very special young lady who loves to travel! Thank you for making such a variety to suit every taste or decor.
customer_reviews.author: GEE

customer_reviews.title: This is a super cool item to have if you love to travel
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cool item to have if you love to travel. The map is very good quality and made to last. I would recommend purchasing a frame for it because it does come rolled and will naturally roll up unless you weigh the corners down. Another recommendation I have is to be careful when you are scratching off the map because it can sometimes scratch. Also make sure to wipe off the residue quickly after scratching because the black residue tends to stick to the map, leaving little spots. Overall a very good product and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice map, and the flags are a good touch
customer_reviews.text: Nice map, and the flags are a good touch. It is actually pretty small however, not so much so that it lowers the quality, but enough to make the European countries both hard to scratch off and hardly noticeable. I would price this lower or wait for a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: These maps are so cool. Simply put
customer_reviews.text: These maps are so cool. Simply put. There are a lot of maps out there but I chose this one because of the quality. The little flags of each country at the bottom really make this map stick out from the rest. It comes with a little goodie bag of sitckers and a scratcher that makes uncovering your destinations easy as pie. Great company, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but still good. Bought as a gift. She seemed to like it. Not sure how well you can scratch off countries, etc
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Actual icons are a little small, and the first time it arrived the sealed box was right but had an American map instead. Amazon handled the return wonderfully though.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found it impossible to get a clean scratch off, leaves a mess especially over the colored flags.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for the traveler in your life!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve purchased in the last year! My boyfriend loved his as did his sister. They travel internationally often and have now started mapping their trips on the map. My boyfriend and I have also planned future trips on his map! Such an amazing gift for the traveler in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice map, glad I got it for my son. You get not only the map itself but the flags. And it is actually accurate and up to date with changes in land borders.
customer_reviews.author: Aren Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The map looks great and the recipient loved it! I got exactly what I purchased and it came on time. I wish it would have come with a smaller/fine point scratch tool for the smaller areas on the map. I was able to locate and purchase a kit that had everything I was needing. Overall very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for some friends of mine and they really enjoyed it. It's high quality and is a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for some friends of mine and they really enjoyed it. It's high quality and is a great keep sake to give someone who travels a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Scratch off the countries you've been to
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to see which countries he had been to (and which he still wanted to go to). We put this under glass on the coffee table as a reminder to him why he needs a job.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product ! Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present to my brother and I love it! Such a good quality! Even the simple package where it came with all the stickers and stuffs. The price is right, so far we don't have any problems scratching off the countries. I followed all the instructions they send me an it's so good. I framed it so it can last longer. My brother love the fact that it came with all the countries flags to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: America Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Love this map
customer_reviews.text: Love this map!! My husband and I use this to track our travels and it's great! The only thing is some of the scratch off part is not aligned correctly so it's easy to accidentally scratch off something you don't mean to. Other than that we really like it. The flags at the bottom are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Aniela Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Scratched when received
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift and there was a scratch over the entire map when my friend opened it so it was a bit disappointing
customer_reviews.author: james t.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool! Sometimes difficult to get some surfaces scratched ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool! Sometimes difficult to get some surfaces scratched off without scarring the underlying paper. But I'm totally re-doubling my efforts to travel...I only thought I was well-traveled till I saw how much space is left to uncover on this map! Very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Abkhazia isn't an independent county
customer_reviews.text: This map includes Abkhazia as an independent country which is a mistake. Abkhazia is part of Georgia and it's so called indepence isn't recognized neither by UN nor by any western country.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Love the packaging and all the pieces seemed intact and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging and all the pieces seemed intact and accounted for. Gave one as a gift and bought one for myself, haven’t actually scratched any land masses off as I want to get a frame to hang on wall. Only giving a four because I haven’t scratched anything yet, but overall no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ruoss

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, and it was well received. It looks good and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bruce Meikle

customer_reviews.title: Missing everything but the map
customer_reviews.text: Was missing everything but the map. No dowels or stickers or scratcher. I gifted it to someone so I can’t exactly return it.
customer_reviews.author: V.V.Voronov

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for my boyfriend he loved it ! He just wished that the map was a bit bigger for example Puerto Rico is not really on my the map it’s like very very tiny but he loved the gift
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it twice
customer_reviews.text: It's a tiny bit smaller than I expected, but it's sooo pretty and it looks very high quality. It comes with a pouch, that has some stickers and a scratching nail.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Arroyo Quirós

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This scratch off map is amazing. It comes with a little pick to scratch off the areas you wish to & little marking stickers. I ordered the white one & am in love with it. Going to order another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the avid traveler
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend who LOVES maps and traveling. He liked it so much he immediately took it out of the box and weighed it down to uncurl it. He's looking forward to scratching some countries off as soon as he can, and getting a frame for it. It is a standard size. The communication from the makers was exemplary.
customer_reviews.author: Diana A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas gift after seeing the overflow of positive reviews, but the scratch off material refuses to come off even with the included tool. Wouldn’t recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great World!
customer_reviews.text: Although tricky in some areas, with patience you can obtain great results! The map looks great. It makes realize how much more there is to see!!!
customer_reviews.author: roberto

customer_reviews.title: I love that it includes the 50 united states and the ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for in a scratch off map. I love that it includes the 50 united states and the different country's maps. Looks really cool as you scratch off palces!
customer_reviews.author: kzooch

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Map!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in Love with this Map. It has everything I need to track my adventures and pick the next getaway.. I purchase the white Map and it looks very delicate in my room. I actually bought a wall poster to protect the edges . Thank you. Happy Customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: It was a lot of fun and started conversations about where we want to go ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife. We started scratching off countries that we have visited together. It was a lot of fun and started conversations about where we want to go next to scratch off a new place. We are mounting it in a frame with no glass so we can keep working on it. My kids want one for the places that they get to visit. I will definitely order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Finlay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, my sister travels a lot, she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Mikeiza

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: She gobbled this up, my travel-obsessed girlfriend. Best idea of mine yet. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift!
customer_reviews.text: This came as I expected. I actually ordered 2 for different people who seemed to really like it. The only problem is some places are so small they will be hard to scratch off without also scratching off the surrounding areas.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fun present for the traveler in your life, what I don’t like is that can’t figure out how to hang it properly without punishing a whole or taping it to the wall, but all good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I still love though. Works great
customer_reviews.text: I know it lists the dimensions, but still smaller than I envisioned. I still love though. Works great, looks great in my office!
customer_reviews.author: MA Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and the person loved it.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I love it even more
customer_reviews.text: This map is GORGEOUS! I bought my boyfriend the white one and he loves it. I got the black, and I have to say, I love it even more! The colors really pop on the black and the gold trim just looks classy. It makes me want to travel even more so I can expose more of this beautiful map!
customer_reviews.author: SJH319

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and only stretched off 3 states but it so pretty and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Ballan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My parents travel frequently and the loved this for Christmas! I just need to buy them a frame but it’s a very high quality map.
customer_reviews.author: Kianna E.

customer_reviews.title: Oh the places you’ll go!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a few small scratches but nothing too crazy. Fun to use! Nice and think poster.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not very excited
customer_reviews.text: I am not excited about the size. Overall good for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Imran

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive seller
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage grandchildren. We had some difficulty with 2 of the maps and the scratching process, when I contacted Landmass Goods they were very responsive, had suggestions for better removal, and immediately replaced the maps.
customer_reviews.author: jual

customer_reviews.title: Best Map Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this map! I have already scratched off the four countries that I've been too (not including USA), Mexico, Australia, New Zealand and Indonesia! I plan on traveling around Europe and South America once I get the funds and I will ever be so excited to scratch off those countries I go to when I visit!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ortega

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift for travelers.
customer_reviews.text: I got one for myself along with one for my best friend and we love the map. Its so cute and really makes me want to travel more by looking at it. Overall 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for gf
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my girlfriend as an anniversary gift she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a graduation gift for my sister just before she took a big trip. She loves it so far. It's up on her wall and looks really nice, and it has scratched well so far. I'm happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: mama_bear_ali

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for a small bday gift since he loves to travel, he was so excited he used it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I bought it for my best friend for her birthday because we travel a lot together and we are both going to europe for the first time this year. This is perfect. I really like that the states in the US are drawn on the scratch off part instead of making you guess like the other options on Amazon seemed to make you do. The flags at the bottom give it a neat touch because it allows you to see what the flag looks like for the country you are traveling to.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Really neat,  just need a frame so you can hang it up.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and it she loved because she is a girl that is in love with traveling, it's really cool and easy to use. Just need a frame for it.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

product_meta.title: Landmass Scratch Off Map Of The World - Black Scratch Off World Map Poster with Flags - World Map Scratch Off - Vibrant Colors - The Gift Travelers Want - 17 x 24 Inches Travel Tracker Map
feature_bullets: Scratch Off Map Of The World - Get the original Travel Tracker scratch off world map. Scratch off the places you've been and reveal your path in beautiful, bold colors that pop against a classic matte black background. This black and gold scratch off world map poster is perfectly sized at 17( h) x 24 (w) inches and will inspire you to plan your next trip.

Clean, Accurate, And Detailed - Precise design, detailed cartography, clean typography, and high-quality craftsmanship. The exquisite design satisfies the deepest wanderlust. This scratchable world map features 210 flags of the world, state outlines for Australia, Canada, and the USA, and island outlines.

A Treasured Gift - This deluxe scratch off world map makes an excellent gift for the traveler in your life. It is perfect for anyone with a sense of adventure. Share stories of countries you’ve visited and create dreams of future travels!

Extras Included - This interactive wall map of the world comes inside a unique and easy to open eco-friendly triangular box. You'll find flags of the world printed on the box. A scratch tool and stickers are included inside of a drawstring pouch. Hanger frame not included.

Satisfaction Guarantee - We stand behind the quality of our maps and are proud to offer a lifetime warranty. If you have any issues with your map, we’ll work swiftly to solve it. Your 100% satisfaction is our top priority!
